document.full_text: protests erupted across much of the arab world on friday, the muslim day of prayer, with demonstrators killed in syria and yemen while egyptians staged one of the biggest rallies since president hosni mubarak's fall.
document.title: friday protests erupt in arab world
lines_and_colors: protests erupted across much of the arab world on friday, the muslim day of prayer, with demonstrators killed in syria and yemen while egyptians staged one of the biggest rallies since president hosni mubarak's fall.
